name: Yeeteorite
description:
An Alien race has declared war against us! We must attack them immediately! Prepare the Space Slingshot and destroy them!

Game Created by:

  • Catriona Barclay (https://beastkotathix.itch.io/)
  • Juan C. Osorio A. (https://juancaos.itch.io/)
  • Tobias Heukäufer (https://iche20.itch.io/)

Music Created by Lucas Gusev, a friend of one of us:

Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTBIMsNpyoxiUZ5T8OCn8BA

Music used: Upload Pending

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences.

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai

"Games A Week" (Winter Semester 2020/21)
